--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Gordon Robson" <robsongo@s...>
wrote:
> Ken,
> 
>  
> 
> Well, it seems clear - lefties are superior!! 
> 


Well of course we are :-)

As a kid, i was fully ambidextrous. I would write to the middle of the
page with my left hand, then change hands and continue to the right.
In those days it wasn't seen as a good thing, so they forced me to
choose a hand. So now i am left handed, but do most sports with my
right hand, and sometimes forget which hands to hold a knife and fork
with. I would think that lefties are far more ambidextrous than right
handed people.
Nice to shave each side of the face with the appropriate hand :-)
As for Muslim customs..I wouldn't know. I use the umm..appropriate
methods. But don't try and shake hands with your left hand if the
person is Muslim...even if you are carrying boxes with your right.
Trust me...the looks will kill you. Haha.

Brian
